verses.verse: And the YY <S%H3068><s%> spake <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8762><s%> unto Mosheh <S%H4872><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%>,

Command <S%H6680><s%> <S%H8761><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>, that they put out <S%H7971><s%> <S%H8762><s%> of the camp <S%H4264><s%> every leper <S%H6879><s%> <S%H8803><s%>, and every one that hath an issue <S%H2100><s%> <S%H8802><s%>, and whosoever is defiled <S%H2931><s%> by the dead <S%H5315><s%>:

Both male <S%H2145><s%> and female <S%H5347><s%> shall ye put out <S%H7971><s%> <S%H8762><s%>, without <S%H2351><s%> the camp <S%H4264><s%> shall ye put <S%H7971><s%> <S%H8762><s%> them; that they defile <S%H2930><s%> <S%H8762><s%> not their camps <S%H4264><s%>, in the midst <S%H8432><s%> whereof <S%H834><s%> I dwell <S%H7931><s%> <S%H8802><s%>.

And the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> did so <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, and put them out <S%H7971><s%> <S%H8762><s%> without <S%H2351><s%> the camp <S%H4264><s%>: as the YY <S%H3068><s%> spake <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8765><s%> unto Mosheh <S%H4872><s%>, so did <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>.
And the YY <S%H3068><s%> spake <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8762><s%> unto Mosheh <S%H4872><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%>,

Speak <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8761><s%> unto the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>, When a man <S%H376><s%> or woman <S%H802><s%> shall commit <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8799><s%> any sin <S%H2403><s%> that men <S%H120><s%> commit <S%H4603><s%> <S%H8800><s%>, to do a trespass <S%H4604><s%> against the YY <S%H3068><s%>, and that person <S%H5315><s%> be guilty <S%H816><s%> <S%H8804><s%>;

Then they shall confess <S%H3034><s%> <S%H8694><s%> their sin <S%H2403><s%> which they have done <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%>: and he shall recompense <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8689><s%> his trespass <S%H817><s%> with the principal <S%H7218><s%> thereof, and add <S%H3254><s%> <S%H8686><s%> unto it the fifth <S%H2549><s%> part thereof, and give <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8804><s%> it unto him against whom he hath trespassed <S%H816><s%> <S%H8804><s%>.

But if the man <S%H376><s%> have no kinsman <S%H1350><s%> <S%H8802><s%> to recompense <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8687><s%> the trespass <S%H817><s%> unto, let the trespass <S%H817><s%> be recompensed <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8716><s%> unto the YY <S%H3068><s%>, even to the Kohen <S%H3548><s%>; beside the ram <S%H352><s%> of the atonement <S%H3725><s%>, whereby an atonement shall be made <S%H3722><s%> <S%H8762><s%> for him.

And every offering <S%H8641><s%> of all the holy things <S%H6944><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>, which they bring <S%H7126><s%> <S%H8686><s%> unto the Kohen <S%H3548><s%>, shall be his.
And every man's <S%H376><s%> hallowed things <S%H6944><s%> shall be his: whatsoever any man <S%H376><s%> giveth <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the Kohen <S%H3548><s%>, it shall be his.
And the YY <S%H3068><s%> spake <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8762><s%> unto Mosheh <S%H4872><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%>,

Speak <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8761><s%> unto the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>, and say <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%> unto them, If any <S%H376><s%> man's <S%H376><s%> wife <S%H802><s%> go aside <S%H7847><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, and commit <S%H4603><s%> <S%H8804><s%> a trespass <S%H4604><s%> against him,

And a man <S%H376><s%> lie <S%H7901><s%> <S%H8804><s%> with her carnally <S%H7902><s%> <S%H2233><s%>, and it be hid <S%H5956><s%> <S%H8738><s%> from the eyes <S%H5869><s%> of her husband <S%H376><s%>, and be kept close <S%H5641><s%> <S%H8738><s%>, and she be defiled <S%H2930><s%> <S%H8738><s%>, and there be no witness <S%H5707><s%> against her, neither she be taken <S%H8610><s%> <S%H8738><s%> with the manner;

And the spirit <S%H7307><s%> of jealousy <S%H7068><s%> come <S%H5674><s%> <S%H8804><s%> upon him, and he be jealous <S%H7065><s%> <S%H8765><s%> of his wife <S%H802><s%>, and she be defiled <S%H2930><s%> <S%H8738><s%>: or if the spirit <S%H7307><s%> of jealousy <S%H7068><s%> come <S%H5674><s%> <S%H8804><s%> upon him, and he be jealous <S%H7065><s%> <S%H8765><s%> of his wife <S%H802><s%>, and she be not defiled <S%H2930><s%> <S%H8738><s%>:

Then shall the man <S%H376><s%> bring <S%H935><s%> <S%H8689><s%> his wife <S%H802><s%> unto the Kohen <S%H3548><s%>, and he shall bring <S%H935><s%> <S%H8689><s%> her offering <S%H7133><s%> for her, the tenth <S%H6224><s%> part of an ephah <S%H374><s%> of barley <S%H8184><s%> meal <S%H7058><s%>; he shall pour <S%H3332><s%> <S%H8799><s%> no oil <S%H8081><s%> upon it, nor put <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8799><s%> frankincense <S%H3828><s%> thereon; for it is an offering <S%H4503><s%> of jealousy <S%H7068><s%>, an offering <S%H4503><s%> of memorial <S%H2146><s%>, bringing <S%H2142><s%> iniquity <S%H5771><s%> to remembrance <S%H2142><s%> <S%H8688><s%>.
And the Kohen <S%H3548><s%> shall bring her near <S%H7126><s%> <S%H8689><s%>, and set <S%H5975><s%> <S%H8689><s%> her before <S%H6440><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%>:

And the Kohen <S%H3548><s%> shall take <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8804><s%> holy <S%H6918><s%> water <S%H4325><s%> in an earthen <S%H2789><s%> vessel <S%H3627><s%>; and of the dust <S%H6083><s%> that is in the floor <S%H7172><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> the Kohen <S%H3548><s%> shall take <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, and put <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8804><s%> it into the water <S%H4325><s%>:

And the Kohen <S%H3548><s%> shall set <S%H5975><s%> <S%H8689><s%> the woman <S%H802><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%>, and uncover <S%H6544><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the woman's <S%H802><s%> head <S%H7218><s%>, and put <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the offering <S%H4503><s%> of memorial <S%H2146><s%> in her hands <S%H3709><s%>, which is the jealousy <S%H7068><s%> offering <S%H4503><s%>: and the Kohen <S%H3548><s%> shall have in his hand <S%H3027><s%> the bitter <S%H4751><s%> water <S%H4325><s%> that causeht the curse <S%H779><s%> <S%H8764><s%>:

And the Kohen <S%H3548><s%> shall charge her by an oath <S%H7650><s%> <S%H8689><s%>, and say <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%> unto the woman <S%H802><s%>, If no man <S%H376><s%> have lain <S%H7901><s%> <S%H8804><s%> with thee, and if thou hast not gone aside <S%H7847><s%> <S%H8804><s%> to uncleanness <S%H2932><s%> with another instead of thy husband <S%H376><s%>, be thou free <S%H5352><s%> <S%H8734><s%> from this bitter <S%H4751><s%> water <S%H4325><s%> that causeht the curse <S%H779><s%> <S%H8764><s%>:

But if thou hast gone aside <S%H7847><s%> <S%H8804><s%> to another instead of thy husband <S%H376><s%>, and if thou be defiled <S%H2930><s%> <S%H8738><s%>, and some man <S%H376><s%> have <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8799><s%> lain <S%H7903><s%> with thee beside <S%H1107><s%> thine husband <S%H376><s%>:

Then the Kohen <S%H3548><s%> shall charge <S%H7650><s%> <S%H8689><s%> the woman <S%H802><s%> with an oath <S%H7621><s%> of cursing <S%H423><s%>, and the Kohen <S%H3548><s%> shall say <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%> unto the woman <S%H802><s%>, The YY <S%H3068><s%> make <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8799><s%> thee a curse <S%H423><s%> and an oath <S%H7621><s%> among <S%H8432><s%> thy people <S%H5971><s%>, when the YY <S%H3068><s%> doth make <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8800><s%> thy thigh <S%H3409><s%> to rot <S%H5307><s%> <S%H8802><s%>, and thy belly <S%H990><s%> to swell <S%H6639><s%>;

And this water <S%H4325><s%> that causeht the curse <S%H779><s%> <S%H8764><s%> shall go <S%H935><s%> <S%H8804><s%> into thy bowels <S%H4578><s%>, to make thy belly <S%H990><s%> to swell <S%H6638><s%> <S%H8687><s%>, and thy thigh <S%H3409><s%> to rot <S%H5307><s%> <S%H8687><s%>: And the woman <S%H802><s%> shall say <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, Amen <S%H543><s%>, amen <S%H543><s%>.

And the Kohen <S%H3548><s%> shall write <S%H3789><s%> <S%H8804><s%> these curses <S%H423><s%> in a book <S%H5612><s%>, and he shall blot <S%H4229><s%> <S%H8804><s%> them out with the bitter <S%H4751><s%> water <S%H4325><s%>:

And he shall cause the woman <S%H802><s%> to drink <S%H8248><s%> <S%H8689><s%> the bitter <S%H4751><s%> water <S%H4325><s%> that causeht the curse <S%H779><s%> <S%H8764><s%>: and the water <S%H4325><s%> that causeht the curse <S%H779><s%> <S%H8764><s%> shall enter <S%H935><s%> <S%H8804><s%> into her, and become bitter <S%H4751><s%>.

Then the Kohen <S%H3548><s%> shall take <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the jealousy <S%H7068><s%> offering <S%H4503><s%> out of the woman's <S%H802><s%> hand <S%H3027><s%>, and shall wave <S%H5130><s%> <S%H8689><s%> the offering <S%H4503><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%>, and offer <S%H7126><s%> <S%H8689><s%> it upon the altar <S%H4196><s%>:

And the Kohen <S%H3548><s%> shall take an handful <S%H7061><s%> <S%H8804><s%> of the offering <S%H4503><s%>, even the memorial <S%H234><s%> thereof, and burn <S%H6999><s%> <S%H8689><s%> it upon the altar <S%H4196><s%>, and afterward <S%H310><s%> shall cause the woman <S%H802><s%> to drink <S%H8248><s%> <S%H8686><s%> the water <S%H4325><s%>.

And when he hath made her to drink <S%H8248><s%> <S%H8689><s%> the water <S%H4325><s%>, then it shall come to pass, that, if she be defiled <S%H2930><s%> <S%H8738><s%>, and have done <S%H4603><s%> <S%H8799><s%> trespass <S%H4604><s%> against her husband <S%H376><s%>, that the water <S%H4325><s%> that causeht the curse <S%H779><s%> <S%H8764><s%> shall enter <S%H935><s%> <S%H8804><s%> into her, and become bitter <S%H4751><s%>, and her belly <S%H990><s%> shall swell <S%H6638><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, and her thigh <S%H3409><s%> shall rot <S%H5307><s%> <S%H8804><s%>: and the woman <S%H802><s%> shall be a curse <S%H423><s%> among <S%H7130><s%> her people <S%H5971><s%>.

And if the woman <S%H802><s%> be not defiled <S%H2930><s%> <S%H8738><s%>, but be clean <S%H2889><s%>; then she shall be free <S%H5352><s%> <S%H8738><s%>, and shall conceive <S%H2232><s%> <S%H8738><s%> seed <S%H2233><s%>.

This is the Torah <S%H8451><s%> of jealousies <S%H7068><s%>, when a wife <S%H802><s%> goeth aside <S%H7847><s%> <S%H8799><s%> to another instead of her husband <S%H376><s%>, and is defiled <S%H2930><s%> <S%H8738><s%>;

Or when the spirit <S%H7307><s%> of jealousy <S%H7068><s%> cometh <S%H5674><s%> <S%H8799><s%> upon him <S%H376><s%>, and he be jealous <S%H7065><s%> <S%H8765><s%> over his wife <S%H802><s%>, and shall set <S%H5975><s%> <S%H8689><s%> the woman <S%H802><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%>, and the Kohen <S%H3548><s%> shall execute <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%> upon her all this Torah <S%H8451><s%>.

Then shall the man <S%H376><s%> be guiltless <S%H5352><s%> <S%H8738><s%> from iniquity <S%H5771><s%>, and this <S%H1931><s%> woman <S%H802><s%> shall bear <S%H5375><s%> <S%H8799><s%> her iniquity <S%H5771><s%>.
